title: Fair Or Foul?
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon react to the 76ers taking back momentum as they even the series, the significance of Ja’s injury and some foul call controversy in Dallas.

itunes:subtitle: PTI: The 76ers And Mavs Take Momentum In Their Respective Series
